title: [GAMEPLAY] Arcade Miss Fortune sound effects mixed up
body:
Yep, it's still happening in 6.1
- If there is an Arcade MF and another 'non Arcade' MF in a game, the Arcade MF uses the classic MF auto attack sound.
- Arcade MF Love Tap sound plays a 'bwip, bwip' instead of the previous 'bwip, bwoop'.

Kateykhaos, _you are breaking my heart._

replies.body:
Heyo! 

I poked ChampUp about the issue - it's on their radar.
Since it's on the radar, should I keep posting about this critical, game changing issue as it continues to occur? Is this the kind of thing that I can watch for in patch notes?
This is something you can keep an eye out for in the patch notes, however, we don't feel that it's a game-breaking issue, which is why it hasn't immediately been resolved.
Hey its been 4 months any update the bug has gotten worse to where it happens regardless of what goes on in game the Arcade MF skin uses the default sound asset
We are aware of the change in the bug, and it's being tracked. I poked the team working on it to see if they can get a fix in sooner rather than later.
Thank you so much for responding! Keep up the great work!
Hey Katey just thought if I could ask for a status update its been about a month since this happened any updates?

So with the news of Arcade MF chromas coming soon I thought I would try out beloved Arcade MF again. It's better but indeed still not fixed.

As far as I could tell, this was the only problem.
\> Arcade MF uses the classic auto attack sound when making auto attacks that trigger Love Tap.

Attacks on targets with Love Tap already applied used the proper Arcade AA sounds. 
I could not tell if it was using the proper double "bwip bwoop" sounds for alternating Love Tap applications. Couldn't hear over the top of the classic AA sounds.

Someone should slap Supercakes. One of the "favourite skins" of the skins team manager has had various audio problems for probably almost 2 (?) seasons now.
We have PTech taking a look at is. As I've mentioned, this is a minor bug, as compared to others. I can check in again today to remind them. :)
